quest.name: The Newer King on the Block
journal: Judging by the hunter's jovial expression, the hunt is still on.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: The great hunter returns. You did well taking on that Rathalos.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: Though I must ask: was the battle grueling? Did the mountains sing with the sound of claws clashing with steel?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I've had tougher battles.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It was admittedly more trouble than I expected.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: Ah, but of course. Perhaps battle with a high-ranking Rathalos would have put a bit of sweat on your brow.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: Truly? I shudder to think what would have happened had you encountered a high-ranking Rathalos, then.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: Piqued your curiosity, have I? Well, I can only tell you what I've heard.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: They say there is a stronger brood of Rathalos that would make short work of your average hunter.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: Mayhap that kitten friend of yours knows something of it. He was, after all, the one who originally posted a bill for the beast.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: No need to worry over it now, though. I'd say you've earned a rest after your recent exertions in the Azim Steppe. When you're up for another hunt I'll be here, ready and waiting.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: The mighty hunter returns, and with herhis feline companion!

dialogue.name: FELYNE
dialogue.text: Feline!? How rude! I am a Felyne you dullard!

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text:
I...fail to see the difference...
Ahem. But that is neither here nor there. I asked Forename to bring you here that we might learn the truth of these high-ranking Rathalos I recently caught wind of.

dialogue.name: FELYNE
dialogue.text: High Rank Rathalos? They're an older, much more powerful brood of wyvern...

dialogue.name: FELYNE
dialogue.text: Without sufficient protection, even the simplest of swipes is all it would take to rend a hunter in two.

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: If I didn't know better, I'd say you were talking about an elite mark. Yes, a challenge no self-respecting hunter can ignore!

dialogue.name: RIVALMOBHUNTER
dialogue.text: It's settled, then. Are you ready, my friend?

dialogue.name: SMITHERY
dialogue.text: Aye! Let's get to it!

dialogue.name: FELYNE
dialogue.text: Your enthusiasm is appreciated, but now isn't the time to be kitten around. To be purrrfectly plain, I'd rather not see another hunter charbroiled today.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have unlocked the Great Hunt (Extreme). Test your mettle against High Rank Rathalos and reap rich rewards!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Please note you may only enter the Great Hunt (Extreme) with four players.

obj.n: The New King on the Block
